portfolioItems.title: Binary Challenge
portfolioItems.description: Having been set the challenge of creating a toy application which would calculate the length of a fence from the numbers of posts and railings, I decided the best way to do this would be to write a library to perform all the necessary mathematical operations in binary.

portfolioItems.title: Counting Challenge
portfolioItems.description: I decided that in order to test my ability to learn new systems, I would complete a simple toy assignment in a particularly minimal esoteric programming language. Before doing this, I had to implement an interpreter so my code written in this language could run in PHP.

portfolioItems.title: This Site!
portfolioItems.description: I designed and built this site myself using HTML, SCSS and TypeScript. I even built the background image myself! You can view the sourBce code on GitHub if you're curious.

portfolioItems.title: Card Game
portfolioItems.description: A group project completed at Mayden Academy, we designed and put together a simple card game powered by JavaScript.

portfolioItems.title: Naked Mole Flats
portfolioItems.description: A group project completed at Mayden Academy, we designed and created a fake housing website over the course of three days using PHP.
